Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. We understand that this might be a significant investment, but we are confident that it will provide substantial returns for you. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
